author: jwasinger
content:
I've got BAL generation and persistence implemented in Geth.  Using my changes, Geth can be ran with a flag which will generate BALs when blocks are fully executed during import.  They are persisted in Geth's database and can be retrieved as json objects via an RPC call.

It's working properly with the testing I have performed so far, and I am now testing it on Sepolia.
